home.title: Helm Charts Explorer
home.subtitle: Explore and download Helm charts in a few seconds.
home.errorInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid Helm repository URL
home.errorFetch: Failed to load the repository. Check the URL or contact the admin if the repo is private.
home.hint: We look for an index.yaml at the repository root. If loading fails, the repo may block cross-origin requests (CORS).

empty.prompt: Enter a Helm repository URL to get started

pull.title: Download an image via skopeo
pull.subtitle: Pull a Docker/OCI image and get a tar archive.
pull.note: The server uses skopeo copy to fetch the image and returns a tar archive.
pull.helper: Enter one or more image references (one per line).
pull.confirmMultiple: You are about to download {n} images. Do you want to continue?

auth.note: For private registries. Credentials are sent directly to the server.
auth.title: Private authentication

errors.required: Please enter at least one image reference
errors.invalid: Invalid format. Valid example: docker.io/library/nginx:latest or ghcr.io/user/image:tag
